name: The Other Side Revised and Expanded
name_original: The Other Side Revised and Expanded
description:
The world is under a massive attack by an unknown evil that lurks within a dark world called The Other Side.  You wake up from a deep sleep and as your vision focuses in, you notice that the screen has a red orange color to it.  You approach the window and see the streets filled with soldiers, destroyed tanks, and people running for their lives.  The surrounding houses are destroyed or on fire.  The ground shakes as every explosion occurs while the soldiers are trying to fight off the evil beings that are invading our world.    

You then realize to check up on your family, so you storm downstairs and find no one to be home.  You start to gather your thoughts to figure out what needs to be done to locate and save your family from the chaos that has erupted around you.   You have several ways to achieve victory, lose, or complete failure.  It's up to you to make the right choices.  This time around this is an alternate and expanded version of the journey.
